data.message: hello facebook my account cant comment anymore whenever i comment  there a box and it said user comment block and dont know why. My last comment is  lots v and then i cant comment anymore pls fix my facebook acc

replies.message: Hi Ken. It sounds like you may have over-used a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access the feature again. In the meantime, you can learn more about our policies by reviewing the Facebook Community Standards: http://bit.ly/2qxx9Fk. -Jessica
